definition: far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up
to think/to believe/to suppose/to wish/to want/to miss (feel wistful about the absence of sb or sth)

sentences.english: Only those that are centers for some type of ambition do.
sentences.chinese: 只有那些成爲遠大理想聚集中心的地方纔會。

sentences.english: The importance of how to have a dream and how to realize it.
sentences.chinese: 樹立遠大理想與努力奮鬥實現理想的雙重重要性。

sentences.english: Nick shares with his audiences the importance of vision and dreaming big.
sentences.chinese: 尼克同他的聽衆分享了擁有願景和遠大理想的重要性。

sentences.english: Cherish youth, pursue broad ideal, the firm lofty ambition.
sentences.chinese: 珍惜青春年華，追求遠大理想，堅定崇高志向。

sentences.english: Big dreams not only inspire you, but they also compel others to want to play big, too.
sentences.chinese: 遠大理想不僅鼓舞着你，也會感染周遭的人。
